message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in purchasing it at this price?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I think we can find a fair middle ground. How about if I offer the product for $75?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $72.50?
I appreciate your feedback, Bob. To accommodate your budget while ensuring fair compensation for the product, how about if I offer it for $74?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $72?
Considering the value and benefits of the product, I'm willing to offer it to you for $73. Can we agree on this price?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $71?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. To reach an agreement, how about if I offer the product for $72?
